memberdef.name: CHECK_PTR
memberdef.initializer: if (A == NULL) \ { \ stringstream o; \ o << "Data pointer for attribute " << B << " is NULL!"; \ Except::throw_exception(API_AttrOptProp,o.str(),"Attribute::set_value()"); \ } \ else \ (void)0

memberdef.name: MEM_STREAM_2_CORBA
memberdef.initializer: if (true) \ { \ string s = B.str(); \ A = Tango::string_dup(s.c_str()); \ B.str(""); \ B.clear(); \ } \ else \ (void)0

memberdef.name: SAFE_DELETE
memberdef.initializer: if (release == true) \ { \ if (is_fwd_att() == true) \ delete [] ptr; \ else \ delete ptr; \ } \ else \ (void)0
